name: Rolling Gauntlet
description: Welcome to the Rolling Gauntlet. See if you are ready to traverse the universe in forty levels. Test the dexterity of your fingers and the strength of your resolve.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel I5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 570 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
